line.comment: * TODO Does the formation really work? Is it performance-safe?
* Reset followers command in case some are into defense mode or fight.
* Commands to retreat only if there was a retreat sector set; otherwise the ship is already on a squadron task.

sval.val: TODO Does the formation really work? Is it performance-safe?
Reset followers command in case some are into defense mode or fight.
Commands to retreat only if there was a retreat sector set; otherwise the ship is already on a squadron task.
